resources.string: ,\nWe just need to verify your email address before you can proceed to the app.\nVerify your email address through the link sent to your email
Please reset your password through the link sent to your email

As a driver, I hereby consent to the Terms and Conditions outlined by KAB. I understand that my participation as a driver is subject to adhering to these terms, which cover areas such as service standards, payment procedures, dispute resolution, and compliance with local transportation laws. By proceeding, I acknowledge that I have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

I agree to share my GPS location in real-time with KAB while I am actively driving and providing transportation services. I understand that this data is essential for ride tracking, ensuring passenger safety, and optimizing trip routes. I consent to the app continuously collecting and using my location data during active trips.
Location service for Cabify to find new rides
